mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.seller_name, c.goods_id, (SELECT goods_image FROM goods_images WHERE goods_id = g.id LIMIT 1) AS goods_icon, g.end_date, IF (g.identity = 1, gs.specifications_price, g.sale_price) AS sale_price, g.origin_price, g.goods_name, g.status, g.taxes, g.identity FROM cart c LEFT JOIN goods g ON g.id = c.goods_id LEFT JOIN goods_specifications gs ON gs.id = c.specifications_id WHERE c.uid = #{uid};

SELECT c.id AS cart_id, c.goods_id, g.goods_name, g.identity, g.uid as seller_id, g.seller_name, c.quantity, (SELECT goods_image FROM goods_images gi WHERE gi.goods_id = c.goods_id LIMIT 1) AS goods_icon, IF ( c.specifications_id IS NULL, g.sale_price, ( SELECT concat(specifications_price, ',', specifications_name) FROM goods_specifications gs where gs.id = c.specifications_id )) AS specification, g.taxes, m.shipping_methods FROM cart c LEFT JOIN goods g ON g.id = c.goods_id LEFT JOIN member m ON m.user_base_id = c.seller_id WHERE c.uid = #{uid} AND c.id IN
#{item}
